synthesis_conditions.washing_method: submerged in 20 mL of DMF, heated at 70 °C for 24 h; DMF decanted and replaced with 20 mL of methanol, heated at 70 °C for 4 days, methanol replaced every 24 h
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: heated at 150 °C under dynamic vacuum on a Schlenk line for 12 h, further activation under dynamic vacuum (<10 μbar) at 180 °C for 24 h at a ramp rate of 0.5 °C/min
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: For larger scale syntheses of Co2(m-dobdc) and Ni2(m-dobdc), stirring at room temperature in a round-bottom flask equipped with a reflux condenser at a concentration of 20.2 mmol H4(m-dobdc) and 50.5 mmol MCl2 (M = Co, Ni) in 1250 mL solvent. Times and temperatures were identical to the small-scale synthesis, but 200 mL of solvent was used for each exchange.
Synthesized in air in a round-bottom flask by stirring.
